presentation.title: Hi, I'm Tiago Dariel
presentation.subtitle: Full-stack developer specializing in front-end systems and taking on the full-stack challenge

about.title: About me
about.description: I’m a front-end developer with over 4 years of experience, mainly working with Vue.js, React, and frameworks like Bootstrap, Material UI, and Element Plus. I spent 3 years at Facilita, where I helped build and maintain web systems using Laravel and Blade. Currently, I work at Cilia, developing modern interfaces and reusable components with Vue.js. I have a growing interest in back-end development, especially with Node.js and Laravel, aiming to become a full-stack developer. I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from UniFanap, a postgraduate degree in Project Management, and I'm currently studying Software Engineering at Instituto DNC to further enhance my technical skills.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my projects:

items.title: Front-end Developer
items.description: Creation of modern and responsive interfaces focused on user experience. Worked on projects using Vue.js 3 and libraries such as Bootstrap, jQuery, and Material UI. Converted Figma prototypes into functional applications, integrated with REST APIs, and collaborated in agile teams. Committed to development best practices, performance, and usability.

items.title: Front-end Developer
items.description: Created modern, responsive interfaces focused on user experience. Worked on projects using Vue.js 2 and libraries like Bootstrap and jQuery. Converted Figma prototypes into functional applications, integrated with REST APIs, and collaborated in agile teams. Emphasized clean code, performance, and usability.
